bibl.title: Account of Livestock from Fayum Villages.
bibl.note: Paper delivered at the 25th International Papyrological Congress (Michigan, 2007). - Belongs to one of the private collections preserved in the Museum of the Faculty of Archaeology, Cairo University under "Sedment 1996, 175_6.A". Arsinoite Nome, 3rd cent. B.C.

Al-Ashiry Mohamed and Mohamed Kashaf, Account of Livestock from Fayum Villages.
BACPS 27 (2010) Part 2, pp. 5-12, 1 tabl., 1 pl. coul.

Paper delivered at the 25th International Papyrological Congress (Michigan, 2007). - Belongs to one of the private collections preserved in the Museum of the Faculty of Archaeology, Cairo University under "Sedment 1996, 175_6.A". Arsinoite Nome, 3rd cent. B.C.
